akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 112–141, div. A, title I, § 1119(b), July 6, 2012, 126 Stat. 491]

akn:content.akn:p:
[§ 214. Repealed. Pub. L. 112–141, div. A, title I, § 1119(b), July 6, 2012, 126 Stat. 491]
Section, added Pub. L. 87–866, § 6(b), Oct. 23, 1962, 76 Stat. 1147; amended Pub. L. 97–424, title I, § 126(d), Jan. 6, 1983, 96 Stat. 2115, related to public lands development roads and trails.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 2012, see section 3(a) of Pub. L. 112–141, set out as an Effective and Termination Dates of 2012 Amendment note under section 101 of this title.
